4063.desc: END GAME Patriots 34th postseason win, ties GB & Dallas for 2nd-most all-time (Pitt 36). Patriots 10th Super Bowl appearance, most all-time (Broncos, Cowboys & Steelers, 8). NE-12 Bradys 8th conference championship, most all-time (Lodish, 6). Bill Belichick 8th conference championship, most by head coach in NFL history (Shula, 6). Robert Kraft's 9th conference championship, most in NFL history (Bowlen, 7).
